original_text: Only I, Daniel, saw this vision. The people who were with me did not see anything. But they became very afraid. They ran away to hide themselves.
korean_text: 이 환상을 나 다니엘이 홀로 보았고 나와 함께 한 사람들은 이 환상은 보지 못하였어도 그들이 크게 떨며 도망하여 숨었느니라

sentences.original_text: Only I, Daniel, saw this vision.
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 나 다니엘만이 이 환상을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The people who were with me
They ran away to hide themselves.
